data.title: California's Top 22 Offshore Drilling Firms
data.meta_description: Explore California's offshore drilling industry with a concise list of top 22 companies, ranging from Kenai Drilling Limited's contract services to Deep Ocean Engineering's advanced design solutions.
data.text:
The offshore drilling industry in California comprises numerous companies that provide a variety of services. These enterprises majorly deal with exploring, developing, and extracting oil, gas, or other valuable minerals located underneath the ocean floor. Their operations span across a broad spectrum ranging from drilling to designing equipment for such explorations like Remotely Operated Vehicles and Unmanned Surface Vehicles. They also provide impactful ecological services to protect the coastline from possible adverse effects of oil drilling. With technological advancement, the industry is progressively gearing towards more efficient and environmentally safer methodologies of resource extraction.

Top 22 offshore drilling companies in California

1. Kenai Drilling Limited

Website: kenaidrilling.com

Headquarters: Bakersfield, California, United States

Founded: 1988

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

Kenai Drilling Limited is a contract drilling services company specializing in the exploration and development of onshore and offshore oil, gas, and geothermal wells. With a rig fleet covering the western United States and mid continent regions, Kenai has grown and adapted to meet the needs of the petroleum industry. The company offers not only planning and drilling services but also specializes in building equipment for challenging drilling locations.

2. Deep Ocean Engineering, Inc.

Website: deepocean.com

Headquarters: San Jose, California, United States

Founded: 1982

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

Deep Ocean Engineering is a company based in California, USA that specializes in the design and manufacture of Remotely Operated Vehicles (ROVs) and Unmanned Surface Vehicles (USVs). With a focus on advanced technology and innovation, their products are used in various industries including offshore oil and gas exploration, underwater research, and marine infrastructure inspection.

3. Get Oil Out Incorporated

Website: getoilout.org

Headquarters: Santa Barbara, California, United States

Founded: 1969

Headcount: 1-10

LinkedIn

Get Oil Out! (GOO!) is a Santa Barbara based public interest group dedicated to the protection of the Santa Barbara Channel and coastline from the deleterious environmental, economic, and esthetic impacts of oil development. GOO!s core membership is comprised of approximately 1500 politically, socially, and economically diverse individuals from the Santa Barbara area and surrounding counties. GOO!s primary activities include enhancing public awareness about oil related issues and impacts through education, and opposing the proliferation of oil development, or minimizing its impacts, by participating in the administrative and legislative process.

4. Magnus Worldwide

Website: magnusworldwide.com

Headquarters: Millbrae, California, United States

Headcount: 1-10

We have been in the Magnus Industrial business since 1958. We are in more than 50 countries worldwide. Our products are widely used in the auto mobile industries, manufacturing, maintenance chemicals, water treatment of boilers and cooling towers. In our product range, we have patents for some of our products. Our research and development department continuously work with the industry leaders to develop new products to solve their challenges. We are committed and try to help solve their problems including helping them to dispose of used chemicals to protect the environment.

5. Pan-American Supply

Website: pan-americansupply.com

Headquarters: Sherman Oaks, California, United States

Headcount: 11-50

Pan-American Supply Inc, is a diversified Oilfield supply company providing a complete range of equipment, parts, accessories and procurement services for Oil and Gas related projects to the energy and industrial markets. We are a well-resourced company, striving for excellence and total customer satisfaction, directly serving the end-users by offering our exceptional supply and service. Pan-American Supply: ""A Complete Supply Source"" ""A General Oilfield Supply Business"" ""A Project-Oriented Business"" ""An Oilfield Supplier You Can Trust"" ""A Diversified Provider of Oilfield Supply"" ""For Urgent Project Supply Requirements"" Pan-American Supply is a well-resourced oilfield supply company serving the Oil, Gas and Petrochemical Projects and Industry. The company has associations with renowned manufacturers, major mills and suppliers across North America, Europe and Asia. Our clients include major Oil and Gas Companies, Projects, Refineries and Contractors. Contact us for a complete line of oilfield equipment & oilfield supply.

6. The Termo Company

Website: termoco.com

Headquarters: Long Beach, California, United States

Founded: 1933

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

The Termo Company is an oil and natural gas production company with over 80 years of experience. They focus on exploring and evaluating investment opportunities, leading safe operations, and reducing their environmental impact. They have strong relationships with partners, investors, and employees.

7. Environmental Defense Center

Website: environmentaldefensecenter.org

Headquarters: Santa Barbara, California, United States

Founded: 1977

Headcount: 1-10

LinkedIn

Environmental Defense Center (EDC) provides legal advocacy and education services to protect the environment in Santa Barbara County. Founded after the 1969 Santa Barbara Oil Spill, EDC addresses emerging environmental threats, advocates for healthy future planning, and empowers organizations to achieve environmental goals.

8. Gregg Drilling, LLC

Website: greggdrilling.com

Headquarters: Signal Hill, California, United States

Founded: 1985

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

Gregg Drilling is a company that offers a wide range of drilling and testing solutions for environmental, geotechnical, and marine purposes. With a diverse range of equipment and capabilities, they provide innovative solutions and sound technical advice to tackle diverse soil conditions and terrain.

9. Pitcher Services, LLC

Website: pitcherservicesllc.com

Headquarters: East Palo Alto, California, United States

Founded: 1933

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

Pitcher Services, LLC is a full-service drilling contractor that offers high quality environmental, geotechnical and marine drilling and testing solutions. The company provides innovative solutions and sound technical advice for a wide range of geotechnical drilling and testing needs.

10. Usc Auv

Website: uscauv.com

Headquarters: Los Angeles, California, United States

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

USCAUV is a company offering solutions and products related to autonomous underwater vehicles and robotics.

11. Frequency Management International

Website: frequencymanagement.com

Headquarters: Huntington Beach, California, United States

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

Frequency Management International (FMI) specializes in providing high-reliability frequency control solutions for extreme environmental conditions. They offer a wide range of crystal oscillators and sensors that operate in high shock, vibration, temperature, and pressure. With certifications in ISO 9001:2015 and compliance with Reach and RoHS standards, FMI delivers quality products for various industries including aerospace, avionics, military, hi-rel space, and commercial space. Their innovative solutions have been recognized globally for their performance in down-hole applications and are deployed in high-performance electronic systems worldwide.

12. Consumer Watchdog

Website: consumerwatchdog.org

Headquarters: Santa Monica, California, United States

Founded: 1985

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

Consumer Watchdog is a non-partisan organization that provides an effective voice for American consumers. They aim to hold medical providers accountable and ensure patient safety. They focus on issues related to healthcare, energy, environment, privacy, technology, and insurance.

13. Bordo

Website: bordoinc.com

Headquarters: South Gate, California, United States

Founded: 1958

Headcount: 51-200

Bordo Inc is a full-service manufacturing company that provides aerial lift and concrete pump components, precision machined components, and offshore oil extraction electrical components for a wide variety of industries.

14. Beacon West Energy Group LLC

Website: beacon-west.com

Headquarters: Carpinteria, California, United States

Founded: 2017

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

Beacon West Energy Group is a company specializing in the management of oil and gas assets. With over 20 years of experience, they prioritize integrity, safety, and efficiency in their project management and operations. Their services include contract operations, decommissioning, engineering services, environmental services, and project management.

15. Carbon Mapper

Website: carbonmapper.org

Headquarters: Pasadena, California, United States

Founded: 2020

Headcount: 1-10

LinkedIn

Carbon Mapper is a company that delivers hyperspectral indicators for carbon and ecosystem management, using a constellation of satellites and aircraft equipped with high-performance spectrometers to monitor and identify methane and carbon dioxide emissions at the scale of individual facilities and equipment.

16. Environmental BioTechnologies Inc.

Website: e-b-t.com

Headquarters: Lodi, California, United States

Founded: 1991

Headcount: 1-10

LinkedIn

Environmental BioTechnologies Inc. is a service provider of surface geo- microbial surveys for the oil and gas industry. For over 20 years EBT has delivered surface microbial geochemistry exploration surveys for the oil and gas industry with our proprietary hydrocarbon exploration process called the MET process (Microbial Exploration Technology), and has recently adapted the MET process to be used for uranium exploration as well. Located in Lodi, California USA. EBT has conducted MET surveys in over 10 countries covering over 17 million acres, with a MET-recommended well completion rate over 80% success worldwide and a dry hole prediction rate of 93%. MET surveys can be used for both on and offshore geo-microbial surveys, and has been used in a wide variety of environments Canadian tundra, Ecuadorian rainforests, Peruvian deserts, and oceanic sediments. The MET process is also an environmentally friendly method of exploration, as there is no special equipment, chemicals, or explosives used during sample collection. The MET technology is able to judge the microbial populations of hydrocarbon degrading microbes present within the soils. Geo-microbial surveys are a cost effective way to survey over a large area. The MET process is cost effective, precise, accurate, and timely. MET surveys are a useful tool when used in conjunction with seismic surveys. Geo-microbial surveys are able to identify surface anomalies, and when compared with the results of a seismic survey you would be able to see where surface signals correlate with sub-surface structures identified by the seismic survey. With only the seismic survey you would be able to identify sub-surface structures, but without the geo-microbial survey you would not know if the sub-surface structure is charged with hydrocarbons. Please browse our website and see how EBT can assist your exploration activities.

17. Mannon Associates

Website: mannonassociates.com

Headquarters: Santa Barbara, California, United States

Headcount: 1-10

LinkedIn

Mannon Associates: Decline Curve Analysis and Petroleum Engineering Consulting.

18. Kana Consultants

Website: kanaconsultants.com

Headquarters: Cupertino, California, United States

Headcount: 1-10

Kana Consultants is a leading supplier of geological personnel to the upstream oil and gas business. The company was incorporated in 1987, initially providing experienced field geologists for mapping projects in the thrust belt of Papua New Guinea. Our company has since grown considerably, and we have now operated in over 50 countries supplying geological personnel to our clients. We operate globally but our operations are based in Singapore where our regional office supports our expanding worldwide business. In Singapore a team of admin, finance and operations personnel are ready to help you with any job enquiries if you are a consultant, or any project enquiries if you are a client looking for an experienced and reliable team to work with. We have developed a core team of experienced Operations and Wellsite geologists and have undertaken many projects providing single consultants, through to larger projects, where we are the preferred supplier for the client's wellsite and office geological operational services. We also provide Geophysicists and Petrophysicists for long and short term projects. We have carried out a number of data room and farmin evaluations. Kana also has a number of Seismic personnel who have expertise in acquisition and processing QC. Kana in recent years has expanded its geographical scope of work into Africa, Middle East, Europe and Central and South America and we now have local and expat consultants with experience in a number of countries in these regions.

19. Driltek Inc

Website: driltek.com

Headquarters: Ventura, California, United States

Founded: 1989

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

DRILTEK is a petroleum engineering company that offers a wide range of subsurface services and project management solutions. With over 30 years of experience, they specialize in deepwater well drilling, rig move optimization, and pump stages. Their highly skilled team combines expertise with cost-saving strategies to deliver top-quality results to clients worldwide.

20. Link Quest Inc

Website: link-quest.com

Headquarters: San Diego, California, United States

Founded: 1998

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

LinkQuest Inc. is an innovative American high-tech company specializing in the development and manufacturing of sophisticated electronic systems for underwater and medical applications. With over 20 years of successful operation in San Diego, California, the company offers a range of advanced acoustics, Doppler, array signal processing, and imaging processing technologies. Their products include diagnostic ultrasound imaging systems, acoustic instruments for offshore oil exploration, acoustic communication and positioning systems, current profilers, and multibeam echosounders.

21. Fairweather & Co

Website: fairweather.com

Headquarters: Sunnyvale, California, United States

Founded: 1976

Headcount: 1-10

LinkedIn

Fairweather is a company that provides support services for Alaska's natural resource industry. They offer a range of services including remote medical services, logistic case management, weather/ice observations, drilling & production support, and more.

22. Decca Energy

Website: deccaenergy.com

Headquarters: Santa Barbara, California, United States

Headcount: 1001-5000

LinkedIn

Decca Energy is an international company specializing in various services for the energy industry. With over 30 years of experience, they offer expertise in engineering, programming, design and implementations, drilling and completions, workovers, optimization, lease and pipeline construction, and facilities. Their focus is on minimizing drilling and completion costs while maintaining long-term relationships with clients.

Want to find more offshore drilling companies?

If you want to find more companies that offer varied services such as exploration, development, and extraction you can do so with Inven. This list was built with Inven and there are hundreds of companies like these globally.

With Inven you'll also get to know the company's:

Ownership: Which of these are private equity backed? Which are family-owned?

Contact data: Who are the owners and CEO's? What are their emails and phone numbers?

Financials: How do these companies perform financially? What are their revenues and profit margins?

...and a lot more!
